author: {'steamid': '76561198054832586', 'num_games_owned': 3166, 'num_reviews': 113, 'playtime_forever': 139, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 139, 'last_played': 1494831189}
review:
Czytanie tej visual novel boli. Powaga, nawet Złotopolscy mają bardziej angażującą fabułę niż ta sklecona naprędce gierka. To, że jest krótka, jest w tym przypadku zaletą.

Nie lepiej sprawa wygląda z bohaterami. Charaktery dziewczyn są strasznie oklepane, a postać męska kompletnie bezbarwna.

Wiadomo, że w grach z serii "Sakura" chodzi w dużej mierze o półnagie, rysowane przedstawicielki płci pięknej, ale jak już ktoś to lubi, to z dwojga złego niech sięgnie lepiej po jakieś anime z tagiem ecchi. Męczenie skrajnie dennej pseudohistorii nie jest warte kilku obrazków. Inna kwestia, że gry Winged Cloud tworzone są w dwóch stylach graficznych. Niektóre, jak Sakura Angels czy Sakura Magical Girls, mają naprawdę dobrze zrobione arty, a w innych, jak np. w Sakura Space czy właśnie Sakura Beach wygląda to moim zdaniem dużo gorzej.

4/10

author: {'steamid': '76561198047454451', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 24, 'playtime_forever': 122, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 122, 'last_played': 1484454959}
review:
Both Sakura beach 1&2 are my favorite games in the sakura games series. these two aren't necesarily the best for the "im just getting this for the porn" types of people, but it does have some raunchy scences for those interested. I would say both sakura beach 1&2 feel more like a dating sim than the other sakura games, and the development of the characters is excellent in both. The story is a typical slice-of-life beach vacation and mixes in some light drama and has probably the most romance out of all of the sakura games instead of the typical "hey, MC, lets FUCK" in the sakura games.

Overall, if you are buying this for the porn and want to support the winged cloud team, do it. but if you are looking for a SUPER SERIOUS DRAMA FILLED ROMANCE VISUAL NOVEL avoid all sakura games. these VNs are meant to be enjoyed and give a comedic feel like a rom/com ecchi anime, not taken as seriously as a Triple-A title.

review:
Yet another anime game review, you're probably wondering why am I bothering writing this since no one is gonna read it, well I'm writing it beacuse not only do I want to maintain writing reveiws but mostly to piss my friends when they see a near hentai anime game appear on their store page on Steam. 

Well back to the topic of this game. It is pretty good, the story and I don't mean the tits for you sick people out there is simple, and detailed which is good but I found it very similar to the previous Sakura game I played - Sakura Swim Club. Only it has zero hentai scenes (not every anime has bloody hentai sex scene it you stereotypical fuck) but it was funny and interesting, thus I found it very refreshing when I played a game that wasn't as sexual as preceding games that I have played. 

For someone that plays a lot RPGs, I felt great immersion in it.

author: {'steamid': '76561198069159152', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 2420, 'playtime_forever': 144, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 144, 'last_played': 1491740242}
review:
A fun little game. Seiji has his head in the stars... literally. But for some reason or another, he has decided to visit the beach one more time, and take his two childhood friends along with him. Being the oblivious man he is, he has... missed cues about how those two friends feel. You have Momoko, the fun-loving blonde, and Ayumi, the harsher brunette. Through your choices, you can land either of them... or both.

About what you expect from a Sakura game.

author: {'steamid': '76561198059534734', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 79, 'playtime_forever': 92, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 61, 'last_played': 1492713390}
review:
Sakura Beach est un jeu avec une histoire typiquement calibrée pour ados japonais pré-pubères qui raconte l' histoire du protagoniste, tiraillé entre l' amour de deux filles, bien évidemment toutes deux folles de lui, sur fond de vacances à la plage, ce qui sera bien évidemment le prétexte idéal pour montrer du boobs et du bikini qui colle bien à la raie des fesses. Pas folle la guêpe... 
Les dessins des deux personnages (pas plus) ne sont pas vilains, même s'il faut reconnaître qu' ils sont très génériques et les expressions très répétitives au bout de dix minutes. L' histoire a été vue mille fois depuis le défunt MSX des années 90 et n' apportera rien de plus au millions de productions romances/ soft-hentai déjà sorties depuis des décennies au Japon. Les backgrounds sont toujours les mêmes: la terrase, la plage, le bar, la chambre d' hôtel. Pas laids, mais peu inspirés. Encore une fois du copié-collé des milliers de productions déjà existantes.  
Enfin, vous devrez aimer le texte si vous décidez d' acheter ce jeu, car il consiste à 90% de textes. Si vous pensez accumuler une collection de screenshots coquins à partager sur votre cloud, vous risquez d' aller au devant d' une cruelle décéption. Vous passerez ainsi les premières minutes à lire conscienscieusement les textes, puis au bout de dix minutes, vous cliquerez frénétiquement afin de passer au slide suivant car, dans notre malheur, il n' y a quasiment aucun choix à faire: 5 tout au plus qui ne semblent pas en outre déterminants. Le reste, c' est walou.
Au final, si vous recherchez un jeu coquin, ce n' est pas celui-là. Il est très très light de ce côté. Je ne le conseillerai pas sinon par curiosité pendant les sales. Et cachez le discrètement de votre liste de jeu, car ça ne fait pas sérieux bande de petits galopins...Je vous ai mis d' ailleurs tous les screenshots les plus intéressants sur mon cloud, ça vous évitera de payer pour un jeu sans grande valeur ajoutée.

Эта визуальная новелла с простым, но интересным сюжетом, отличной рисовкой и музыкальным сопровождением. Радует то, что есть две концовки. С удовольствие прочитала новеллу. Сюжет 9 из 10 ; Музыка 8 из 10; Обстановка и главные герои 8 из 10. / Good day Nya) I recommend to all fans of anime fished a small time this game. This visual novel with a simple but interesting plot, great panache and music. The good news is that there are two endings. With pleasure to read the novel. Plot 9 out of 10; Music 8 out of 10; The situation and main characters of 8 out of 10.

author: {'steamid': '76561198026565056', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 603, 'playtime_forever': 156, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 156, 'last_played': 1485650547}
review: Sakura Beach is a slice of life visual novel by Winged Cloud. You read from the prespective of Seiji, a young man with his head in space, who goes on a beach trip with his two best friends Momoko and Ayumi. During the week long trip, Seiji just wanted to daydeam and look at the stars, but his friends have other plans. The story is actually good, more or less about friendship/relationships and being honest with others. The art work is quite beautiful.The music is basic and pretty much set the mood for the scenes. It has two ending, one for both the girls. It is about 2-3 hours long. And I give this a 7/10.

author: {'steamid': '76561198112906905', 'num_games_owned': 929, 'num_reviews': 10, 'playtime_forever': 151, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 151, 'last_played': 1479169253}
review:
Che dire su questa visual novel? Ore totali di gioco: 2h e mezza. 
La trama non è particolarmente impegnativa da capire ma questo senza dubbio non rende l'esperienza noiosa, anzi le scene divertenti fra il protagonista e le due seducenti fanciulle non fanno altro che accentuare la scorrevolezza della trama. 
Non mancano le scene ecchi (che i fan degli anime apprezzeranno sicuramente) e sinceramente ci tengo a sottolineare quanto la musica fosse davvero coinvolgente e non eccessivamente caotica. Le scene ecchi, ad esempio, avevano una musica parecchio buffa sottollineata dalla strumentazione utilizzata e dal tipo di melodia utilizzata.
Curioso e interessante il fattore scelte, che ti permette sicuramente di avere delle reazioni differenti delle due protagoniste. 
Una bella esperienza che mi ha divertito e non poco. Un bel 8 se lo merita, non resta ora che giocarsi il 2! 
Titolo che consiglio assolutamente a chi apprezza questo genere.

author: {'steamid': '76561198142240214', 'num_games_owned': 665, 'num_reviews': 662, 'playtime_forever': 961, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 961, 'last_played': 1471345489}

author: {'steamid': '76561198272453188', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 36, 'playtime_forever': 416, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 416, 'last_played': 1479131130}
review:
这个游戏说白了就是看球，但剧情是很普通的那种，中学生的男主和两个女主，相约去沙滩度假。
点击很多，唯一的感觉就是没有什么看头，特别废左键的游戏！！
但！但！但当你仔细看了作者的描写，再加以配图，真是想象无限。如果你细细品味配图吸引人的片段的话，你会从中获得一段愉快的时光。

而且，帮助学习英语！！！！！
来来来，跟着我一起学习单词
女一的胸部像什么？melon（甜瓜）
我们的手该怎么进入女主的胸罩？slip（滑）
那么我们先怎么办？knead（揉）
然后对于top该怎么办呢？clamp（夹）
情到深处又该怎么办？squeeze（这个不知道的自己去查）
总之，自学英文，支持正版！！！！！！

author: {'steamid': '76561197982295752', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 2097, 'playtime_forever': 137, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 18, 'last_played': 1487434858}
review:
Sakura Beach is a Japanese Anime Visual Novel.  Good artwork, animation, sound, story, gallery, english subtitles, background music.  The controls and UI is usefull.  Very tame artwork, a little ecchi like losing bikini tops but nothing showing naughty bits.  The Story about 3 childhood friends on vacation at the beach, 1 geeky guy (the protagonist) and 2 girls.   
Has 5 minor choices that change the dialogue in that section.  Has two different girls to interact with. Has Ecchi and fanservice stylings.  No patch needed, the artwork is as is.  Good for a few hours of reading.  Might be cliche.  You could just skip throught the dialogue and get through the end to unlock all the pictures.

Get it with the Sakura bundle, when on sale.  Could be worth deep sale price, if you really like visual anime novels, but not the hentai kind.  If you want just the ecchi artwork, you could save your money and look at what others have posted on netz.  If you are looking for Hentai and reason to fap, this VN does NOT have it.

For more info:
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=lqbSiLMCy6A

http://forums.fuwanovel.net/blogs/entry/705-blooming-love-on-the-summer-beach-random-review-sakura-beach/

http://www.metacritic.com/game/pc/sakura-beach

https://gbatemp.net/review/sakura-beach.370/

author: {'steamid': '76561198136886006', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 28, 'playtime_forever': 333, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 333, 'last_played': 1477067309}
review:
It's typical for a Sakura story. Here let me go through the process; 

The main character is some dork with a stupid problem who for no reason at all gets a harem of girls, only I'm guessing there was a budget constraint as there's only two of then. 

Dork acts like a total cuck and can't figure out these girls want to polish off his drumstick. 

Dork gets into awkward situations which then brings about an alarming amount of bodily harm, in which the story actually transitions 90% of the time because your character has been beat up by a girl.

A girl's top falls off.

The other girl's top falls off. 

The girls pound the idea that they love him into the guy's head but he stands around like a total moron unable to register emotions like a human being. At this point I'm pretty sure Sakura protagonists are robots designed in a lab to completely avoid the fairer sex and run away like moron's when they see a boob or butt.

Guy gets with a girl after some boring crap. All is well in the land of Sakura.

I'm giving it a negative review because even for a Sakura game it feels exceptionally boring. It's got two choices which don't matter, a boring problem, and I can say with all honesty tha the ONLY good thing about this VN were the backgrounds, which looked fairly nice. But maybe that's because I like the beach and can't go.

author: {'steamid': '76561198006807587', 'num_games_owned': 4228, 'num_reviews': 103, 'playtime_forever': 462, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 462, 'last_played': 1475856733}
review:
Итак, на очереди третья пройденная мною ВН из серии "Сакура". Сразу же повторюсь словами из моего обзора "Sacura Spirit", т.к., по всей видимости, это будет актуально и для всех частей серии:
"Акцент, в отзывах, конечно же, на полуголых девицах, но знаете... именно ради этого брать смысла-то и нет! Вся галерея есть в разделе скриншотов. Поэтому, если история тоже неинтересна, то брать, по сути, только тем, кто хочет отблагодарить разработчиков."

Н-да, ну здесь почему-то разработчики сделали сразу несколько шагов назад, после отличной "Sakura Angels". Интерфейс опять подрезали, музыки почти не завезли. Еще и изменили рисовку, собственно, такое впечатление, что это сайд-проект.
Ну да ладно. Что же на этот раз? Парень и 2 девушки на пляже, бесплатно и без СМС...
При таком раскладе интересного сюжета не ожидается, но так ли это?
На этот раз наш герой - мечтатель, весь замкнувшийся в самокопании. Что уж говорить, проблемы все переживают по-своему, в том числе ту, что вскроется у ГГ, но у этого молодого человека уж какой-то неадекватный заскок, настолько он отрешен от реальности. Две девицы же (на этот раз в купальниках, пляж же), по-умолчанию втюхались в ГГ, еще до начала истории. Когда выяснится, насколько долго это длится, останется лишь поберечь лицо, чтоб не расквасить его фейспалмом. Собственно, шуток в этот раз и нет, остается лишь разве что ухмыляться над тугодумным ГГ.
Ну и весь сюжет состоит из самокопания, флирта и задушевных разговоров в одни ворота от каждой из девиц. Собственно, всю глубину отчаяния и непроходимости ГГ можно оценить по тому, что где-то треть эро картинок - лесбийские [spoiler] (в одной из сцен нашего персонажа даже зовут присоединиться, но он убегает, чтобы потом в конце удивиться, что он, оказывается, не просто друг) [/spoiler], настолько сильно хотят девушки расшевелить своего возлюбленного. Короче, это можно было бы назвать повестью о крутом френдзонщике, который мстит за всех отвергнутых парней, если бы только ГГ делал все это специально.
Развилки есть, концовки 3 (по 1 на каждую и гаремная-бестолковая).
Характер девиц, недолго думая, по-большей части скопипастили из "Sakura Angels". Да, это архетипы, но в Sakura Angels реализованы интересней. Впрочем, это не единственное, что повторили в повествовании из Sakura Angels. 
Рисовка другая, первая была приятней глазу, но дело вкуса, я так думаю.

В итоге, часть получилась каким-то шагом назад. Если и брать, то по очень большой скидке или в инди-бандле. Хотя, возможно, если это будет вашей первой частью, то будет смотреться лучше.

author: {'steamid': '76561198157821029', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 12, 'playtime_forever': 315, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 315, 'last_played': 1475417074}
review:
[b]Come in ogni opera ci sono sempre dei lati positivi, quindi qualche piccola cosa mi è piaciuta. Ma ne sconsiglio l’acquisto perché per quelle piccolissime cose piacevoli, non vale la pena né spenderci dei soldi ( anche pochi ) e né sorbirsi tutta la maggior parte della Novel, che noiosa è dir poco.[/b] 


[h1]PRO[/h1]

-Disegni molto ben fatti, anche per quanto riguarda le proporzioni dei corpi che rendono le ragazze molto femminili. Meglio di molti altri su steam sicuramente

-Vuoi sapere come va a finire aldilà di tutto

-Pensavo di proprendere più su una delle ragazze ma circa a metà del percorso, ho cambiato idea, e poi ancora ed ancora, e sono rimasto combattuto fino alla fine. Una sciocchezza ma che stranamente mi ha divertito.

-Qualche riflessione non male verso la fine della storia



[h1]CONTRO[/h1]

-Protagonista assessuato, stupido e totalmente inutile ( non fatemi parlare della scena alla scogliera durante il tramonto dove le due ragazze fanno una determinata cosa insieme, e lui scappa: ma chi diavolo sarebbe scappato? ). Le ragazze qui sono tutto, prendono loro le iniziative, tanto valeva non dare a lui nemmeno una "personalità" con tutte quelle cazzate sul diventare astronauta. Sicuramente è stato fatto così apposta per farti immergere più nella storia, ma visto che ha degli interessi e una storia personale abbastanza dettagliata a questo punto fargli fare qualcosa di pazzo, o dire qualcosa di divertente anche solo pensarlo non sarebbe stato male. Invece è semplicemente monocolore dall’inizio alla fine, sia con gli altri personaggi e sia nella sua testa. 

-Narrativamente è noiosa, prevedibile e piatta, sai già dove vuole andare a parare la storia e sai già dove vogliono andare a parare le due ragazze ( una confusa tettona accondiscendente che seduce il protagonista per poi dargli del pervertito e una tsundere che passa dall’arrossire ogni cinque secondi ad un offesa ): vuoi semplicemente saltare tutto per arrivare al punto. Purtroppo non mi ha nemmeno strappato un sorriso. Tra le migliaia di riflessioni del protagonista ce ne erano un paio non male, ma si perdono tra la noia e l’interminabile giro in tondo di discorsi su quanto lui non capisca il comportamento delle ragazze e sulla rimandatissima dichiariazione, che sembra un inutile allungamento di brodo. 

-Gli artwork "spinti" sono troppo dilazionati e prima di vederne uno ti tocca sorbirti testi e testi, con sfondi anonimi e i due sprite delle ragazze con solo tre espressioni e due vestiti dall’inizio alla fine.  E' vero puoi saltare tutto con "Skip", ma che senso ha la visual novel allora?

-Mi aspettavo nudità e simulazione  ( visto che è ciò che dicono le etichette ), invece sembra censurato, la nudità è parziale e veramente risicata, sono tutte sempre in costume da bagno ( massimo scivola via il pezzo sopra del bikini e si coprono con le mani i capezzoli ), e l’interattività è ridotta all’osso. Concordo con altri che dicono che sembra una presentazione power point: avendo già un carattere il protagonista è praticamente in cambio automatico, e le scelte non arrivano mai e sembrano cambiare davvero pochissimo, basta guardare il finale. A questo punto mi guardo un anime ecchi.

-Tre finali? Sono praticamente uguali.

-Sottofondi musicali senza sapore, sicuramente inseriti con criterio, ma che vuoi rimpiazzare con altro.

[u]In conclusione:[/u]

Se volete semplicemente masturbarvi su tipe in 2D, fate prima a farvi qualche ricerca su internet, le immagini arrivano subito, sono gratuite e non dovete sorbirvi tutti quei testi  ammazza entusiasmo.
Se sperate invece di trovarci qualcosa di stimolante a livello narrativo, purtroppo rimarrete delusi.

author: {'steamid': '76561198074350037', 'num_games_owned': 410, 'num_reviews': 10, 'playtime_forever': 249, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 249, 'last_played': 1475115791}
review:
Одна из худших новелл что я читал.

Самое главное что меня просто выбесило это диалоги + сюжет, они настолько тупы что я не понимаю откуда у этой новеллы столько положительных отзывов. И вместе с тупостью диалогов рядом находится тупость гг, бл**ь ему практически прямым текстом все говорят, а он типо "что, я не понимаю", вообщем у меня кажется сотрясение.

А теперь про музыку - что за хрень, такое чувство что ребенку дали дудку, записали и засунули в игру, это наверно худший саунд из всех что я слышал (я серьезно).
 
Ах да чуть не забыл почему в игре всего 6 спрайтов, нет серьезно в такой известной серии как сакура 6 спрайтов +- 1-2 они не могли что ли нарисовать еще парочку почему для злобы и обиды (и многих других) используют одинаковые спрайты, может мне кажется, но в тойже спирит с этим вроде было получше.

 В общем что я хочу сказать - это худшая часть сакуры, и одна из худших новелл из тех что я играл. Не берите ее.

author: {'steamid': '76561197971532357', 'num_games_owned': 2752, 'num_reviews': 413, 'playtime_forever': 166, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 166, 'last_played': 1472238814}
review:
Sakura Beach is the first Sakura game I've installed. While it's a polished title, it's not quite what I was expecting.

Seiji is dreaming about stars to the point that he's forgetting that he has friends, Momoko and Ayumi. Both of them dragged him for a week on a beach and are trying to convey a message. Will Seiji understand?

The story itself is well-written: some good old "pervert" joke, when Seiji is not even one, the guy suddenly aware that these girls may be interested in more than friendship, some good poetry when Seiji is speaking about stars, etc..

However, it's in the gameplay that Sakura Beach is clearly lacking. Like Blue Rose or Shan Gui, you have a lot of dialogues. Contrary to Shan Gui, you don't have any cultural reference, apart the stars. Contrary to Blue Rose, the choices are really limited. In other words, too much dialogue kills the game. It's the same with Sakura Beach. That's the main negative point: apart siding with Momoko or Ayumi, which is determining your ending, for what 4 or 5 times, you don't any other thing to do. I understand that a visual novel isn't always about choices but I would have preferred more freedom for the player to choose his path than just waiting it after I don't know how many lines of dialogues and fan service pictures.

Sakura Beach, while being clearly in fan service (Momoko has huge breasts, contrary to Ayumi who seems more human compared to her friend for example), is still well designed. I loved the graphics and the backgrounds. And to top that, the music was really good.

Clearly, I liked Sakura Beach a lot but the fact that there were many dialogues before a choice is killing for me the game. I would have preferred a little more action (and when I say that, I mean, more choices, not anything else). Is this huge negative point outweighting everything? Sadly, yes. Blue Rose was more interesting in terms of plot but the length of the dialogue bored me to death. It's the same here. I was bored.

However, it's not because I'm rating it down that you shouldn't give a chance to it if you like visual novels with few choices and with a good story. However, I would wait for a bundle or for a discount.

review:
Понятия не имею откуда взялось столько положительных отзывов. Очень посредственная новелла с тупым гг, нелепым сюжетом и днищенскими диалогами. Юмора не замечено; продолжительность - пара часов; задники простенькие и их от силы 10 шт.; с музыкой дела не лучше - за всю "игру" наберется 3-4 ничем не примечательных мелодии; тема сисек не раскрыта.

Единственный плюс - одна из тянок нарисована более-менее сносно.

author: {'steamid': '76561197963405015', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 15, 'playtime_forever': 91, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 91, 'last_played': 1475712949}
review:
Here is another welcome and successful addition to the Sakura Franchise. For some it will seem like a total waste and useless content, but for those few who enjoy any and all anime content on steam or the web overall it is filled with more good artwork, humor, boobs and anime cuties.
What more can one ask for? How about steam cards and emoticons with cute pics? How about great steam badges?
As for those few pragmatists out there - very expensive steam card & icon investment?
Mostly it is a good way to pass some time.

Did I mention excellent steam backgrounds?
As you can see there is a little something in this for almost everyone.

P.S. I said ALMOST because if this review did not apeal to you in any way, then just simply move along. In the words og an old master: "This is not the game you're looking for."

author: {'steamid': '76561198089299679', 'num_games_owned': 7216, 'num_reviews': 392, 'playtime_forever': 333, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 333, 'last_played': 1470319154}
review:
Another one of the Sakura serie on steam...

We all know what this kinda game is about.. "Plot" and "Research"...

This VN story is on a beach by title.. You are a young boy that travel with 2 sexy young girl to have fun on a beach for a vacation.. You will have a lot fun together and a lot awkward moments. Plot is Great and Research size is quite huge...

During story you will meet with 4-5 choices... what you pick will determine which girl you end up with at the very end of the story.

There are not much else since it's just a very simple VN...

4-5 different repetitive music song.. no narrative voice .. Decent graphics...

7/10.. only recommended for a bit fan service and a quick 1-2 hour read....

author: {'steamid': '76561198116853482', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 8, 'playtime_forever': 109, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 109, 'last_played': 1468703677}
review:
Worse visual novel I've played so far. 

Terrible story, lazy and mainstream dialog for fan serviced stories, only 3 drawn characters in the entire visual novel, 1 is the protagonist, the other 2 are the girls the protagonist is supposed to fuck, and, 'by chance', the hottests girls in the school, his childhood friends and stereotyped fan service VN heroines (big tits: good at sports and bad at cooking, smaller tits: smart and tsundere). 

109 minutes to finish the game, 109 minutes! For 10 euros! Luckily I bought it as a bumdle with other VNs for an insignifiant price, on Humble Bumdle.

The art is pretty good.

Summary, don't buy this shit for its full price, if buy it. I get it, pure fan service, not supposed to have story, but if wanna fap for expansive well drawn stuff, you might as well waste your money on porn website subscriptions (search for one with hentais).

There are better VNs that are for free and give you 12h+ gameplay per route (Everlasting Summer for example).

author: {'steamid': '76561198039646296', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 5, 'playtime_forever': 310, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 310, 'last_played': 1467686309}
review: This was my second visual novel that I finished and I have to say I loved this one much more then Angels even though at the beggining I wasn't liking it that much till about halfway through the story. The story a guy you play as named Seiji who daydreams more often then ever and his two childhood friends Ayumi and Momoko who have not seen him in a while so they plan a trip to a beach together for a week. With there being about four choices in the game but not meaning a thing I was worried I wasn't going to like this much as much as the last, but I loved the story for this one and actually liked Seiji later on in the story. At first I thought Seiji's situation with the two girls was the same thing as the Sakura Angels story minus the conflict but later on you find out why he was acting like that and start to not hate him any more for how he was at the start of the novel. The girls on the other hand cute for sure but not as likable as the ones from angels they just didn't jump out to me in a lovable way like the past game characters did. Though that does not mean I did not like them they were cute and funny and I am hoping in the sequel I can get more attatched to them and hope they do something that will make me actually remember them as amazing characters. Also th eending almost had me shed a tear unlike angels but I did not. So somewhat emotional, around a 5 hur story, alright characters, great artwork, I give this a solid 8/10 simply because some aspects may of fell short for this novel the emotional ending of it is what really sealed the deal for me and is what I love most about these visual novels. Also probably one of the only situations in history where Polygamy wasn't bad cause how it lead to it.

author: {'steamid': '76561198124770841', 'num_games_owned': 2744, 'num_reviews': 555, 'playtime_forever': 258, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 258, 'last_played': 1465367806}
review:
第三场球赛已经转移阵地到海滩了。
整体感觉第三场球赛的每个球都更精彩了。不知道是换了画师还是画师的水平渐长。个人更喜欢这种明厉的线条。
说实话，动漫里无论是正常漫还是galgame，我都比较喜欢线条有明显绘画笔触的风格的，粗细变化明显的线条，浓重的转折，狂野的打影，即越有实际笔纸画出的感觉越喜欢。用手绘板画再经由各种软件处理出来的cg图，已经很难看出手绘的痕迹，线条的表现已经不那么重要，已经不明显，不跳跃，没有张力。

author: {'steamid': '76561198103083802', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 1, 'playtime_forever': 284, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 284, 'last_played': 1465142241}
review:
I will give this "Game" aka Visual Novel a thumbs up, but just slightly. This game is a pure snorefest at the start of the game. The story doesnt start to pick up until about half way through. I think my biggest issue was lack of simple drawings that could have been added for more depth to the characters. There isnt a whole lot more they really would have had to add (such as the proper face expression the story calls for), so the fact they refused to even take those extra steps makes it a bit more infuriating. Full disclosure this was my foray into visual novels, so I dont know if this is par for the course. From images seen before online this has contributed to my hesitation of purchasing such "games". I love anime and the art in these games, but I dont understand the phenomena.

Once the story started to get what I thought was pretty good, it started making the WEIRDEST choices. The absolute worst thing was a scene that was playing out that was very touching when the main character is finishing up his last words, BAM it flips to a super sexual lesbian kiss between the two female character with them asking him to join. I just thought "WTF". Dont get me wrong I appreciate some very sexual lesbian kissing but a. It just wasnt the time or sexual at all and b. Nothing up until that point suggested that the female characters hooked up but instead were very much into the guy but to "Embarresed' to express that love. Yet once it turns in to a hot makeout session all self respect went out the door and he can just go take advantage of these females (even though he didn't). Before that they would knock him out for seeing theier underwear which covered more skin then the bikinis. I mean the list of things that dont make sense from a story telling standpoint to this game would be insane. But like mentioned earlier if you can overlook some of the oddities towards the end, then the story get a bit sweet. The character 'Ayumi" is one of the best drawn females characters I personally think in all of anime subject mannor.

Take with my word with a grain of salt. I am no professional gamer, writer/reviewer, or have any experience, any of that fun stuff.

author: {'steamid': '76561198022592631', 'num_games_owned': 9257, 'num_reviews': 311, 'playtime_forever': 268, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 124, 'last_played': 1465052122}
review:
[b] Sakura Beach ... [/b]
... ist gleich wie sein Nachfolger nicht das beste Spiel seiner Sorte. Die Grafiken hätten teils besser ausfallen können und die Hintergründe wirken zu steriel. Es sieht so aus, als würden diese übertrieben operierten Puppen vor einer Fotoleinwand stehen. Die Story ist ein Witz und man versteht nach kurzem Anspielen, dass der Fokus eindeutig nicht darauf liegen sollte. Wer also schöne Standbilder haben möchte, die es auch bei Onkel Google zuhauf gibt, kann es sich holen. Seinen Preis ist es aber allemal nicht wert!

author: {'steamid': '76561198041726894', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 29, 'playtime_forever': 91, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 91, 'last_played': 1461272434}
review:
La série Sakura ne vole déjà pas très haut. Mais j'ador(e)ais, le chara-design et le scénario me faisait (presque) toujours  sourire si pas rire tellement il était "bateau".
Mais cette fois-ci, c'est vraiment vraiment mauvais... Le scénarion est tellement plat et téléguidé qu'il n'est pas pervenu à m'arracher un sourire. C'est lent, long et d'un ennuyeux à mourir. Quant au nouveau chara-design, pffffffff, par rapport au précédents titres de la série, j'accroche pas.

author: {'steamid': '76561198087834803', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 228, 'playtime_forever': 355, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 341, 'last_played': 1466058549}
review: The story of a clueless protagonist whose two anime stereotype childhood friends compete to win his love with fanservice that's so ridiculous (oh no my bikini top randomly fell off, because that's how clothes work, right?) and out of nowhere that I'm surprised the twist ending wasn't that the protagonist was just hallucinating. On the other hand, the story has some surprisingly sweet moments about the awkwardness of expressing your feelings and trying to navigate a poly relationship. Not interesting enough to recommend, but if you like the art style, might be worth picking up in a bundle.

author: {'steamid': '76561198017142257', 'num_games_owned': 420, 'num_reviews': 39, 'playtime_forever': 522, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 506, 'last_played': 1527513309}
review:
История о мечтателе Сейджи, который за своими мечтами о космосе, мог пропустить самое важное приключение в своей жизни.
О близких друзьях, которые решаются на отчаянный шаг в попытке вырвать его из плена грез. 
История о соперничестве и борьбе двух юных дев за внимание нашего героя.
Впрочем все это отходит на второй план, ведь это Летние каникулы, а значит это время приключений и любви.
Русский язык доступен в разделе Руководства, а это значит теперь каждый сможет окунуться в эти приключения!

author: {'steamid': '76561198080390728', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 75, 'playtime_forever': 278, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 278, 'last_played': 1458228945}
review:
Как-то не очень. Я не из тех людей, кому в каждой части серии подавай что-то новое, но тут я прямо-таки вижу, как сценарист думал: "Ааа, пофиг, скопируем Саяку и Хироми из Sakura Angels, засунем очередного унылого обсоса с атрофированным половым инстинктом и без мозгов, и пусть все они едут на пляж, а там уж как-нибудь само вывезет." Предыдущие Сакуры тоже не блистали интересными историями, но там хотя бы была какая-то точка, откуда герои начинали движение по сюжету, и точка, куда они хотели попасть. Тут же вы просто неделю торчите на пляже, слушаете нытьё ГГ, отбиваетесь от домогательств одной девицы и получаете люлей от другой. А потом неделя заканчивается, все собирают вещи и разъезжаются по домам. Захватывающе, правда?
А вот художников стоит похвалить. Картинка яркая,  сочная и вместе с тем тёплая, мне она напоминает советский мультфильм про Крошку Енота. Наблюдать за сменой выражений лица у героинь одно удовольствие. Честно, такая рисовка достойна гораздо лучшего. Если бы ещё озвучка была... 
Короче говоря, сценарист заслуживает максимум чтобы в него швырнули тапком, а художники - большие молодцы, если бы не они, то всё было бы совсем печально. 
Своих денег игра явно не стоит, так что советую, но с хорошей скидкой.

author: {'steamid': '76561198064904466', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 2, 'playtime_forever': 201, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 201, 'last_played': 1456878461}

author: {'steamid': '76561198047795790', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 125, 'playtime_forever': 231, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 231, 'last_played': 1456384543}
review:
Скуууучно.
Купил, потому что понравилась Sakura Spirit. Разочарован. Всего два персонажа, мало фонов, причем за исключением пары слайдов, что бы ни происходило по тексту, на картинке они стоят и разговаривают. Для меня это выглядит как удачная попытка срубить легких денег на волне успеха Sakura Spirit. Текст откровенно скучный, что вместе с малым разнообразием картинок делают Sakura Beach неудачным приобретением.
Не рекомендую.

author: {'steamid': '76561198067320147', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 8, 'playtime_forever': 249, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 249, 'last_played': 1452132933}
review: It's your typical summer vacation love story, short and sweet. Basically, you are a guy who goes on a vacation with your two childhood friends who also happen to be girls. The girls have fallen in love with you, but you are too dense to notice that. The whole vacation are the girls trying to show you that they are in love with you, and that's the whole story of this game about. This game can be considered silly, but in a good way since it features quite a lot of slapstick humor (so far the only Sakura title who features actual comedy) However, there are a lot of ''drama-moments'' and existential crisis moments. It's also implied that at least two of the three characters had a traumatic past/childhood. The game has an ending for each girl. There is no hardcore nudity in Beach, since the artist who made Beach doesn't do hentai, of course there will be the typical ''ecchi'' moments. It's not a bad game, the beginning is quite slow, but towards the end (when more drama-moments appear) the game gets quite serious, and depending on personal experiences quite sad.

author: {'steamid': '76561198104214038', 'num_games_owned': 2125, 'num_reviews': 16, 'playtime_forever': 114, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 114, 'last_played': 1448434590}
review:
I played this after playing Sakura Spirit, Angels, Fantasy 1, Swim Club, and Clicker.

This VN is a bit different than the other Sakura games in that the artist is Inma instead of Wanaca, but don't let that steer you away! It may look different but I assure you the art is still really great. This VN has some hints of Angels and Swim Club to it in terms of story and choices. Even though the MC is kind of an oblivious idiot, like in Spirit, he actually has a legit reason why he might not be focusing too much on why the girls act the ways they do. The story actually is pretty sad and emotional at some parts, kinda like Swim Club, which I really enjoyed. It made me actually feel for the fool. Just like Angels and Swim Club you have two girls basically competing for your attention and your choices do matter more like they do in Angels. All in all this is a fun read with some silly lewd pics to keep you interested if you get a bit bored with the story.

P.S. Don't bother looking for a patch, Inma doesn't make patches.

author: {'steamid': '76561198094337747', 'num_games_owned': 280, 'num_reviews': 109, 'playtime_forever': 1503, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1503, 'last_played': 1446646236}
review:
1 yılda 7 oyun çıkaran Winged Cloud firması her oyununda yeni teknikler geliştirerek oyuncuları etkiliyor. 7 farklı Sakura oyunundan bahsediyoruz ve bunların bir de 2. oyunları da çıkacak. Tamamlanmamış, ileri yönelik bir sonla bitmiş çoğu oyunu var bu serinin. Örneğin bu oyun mesela. Büyük bir soru işareti ile oyunu bitiriyor ve yeni oyunu beklemenizi istiyor resmen. Oyunu bitirdim bir baktım 2. oyunu çıkmış. Ben Sakura Fantasy 2 çıkar derken Sakura Beach'in çok hızlı satıldığını gören firma kararı Beach'te kılmış.

Oyuna geri dönersek oyunda bir erkeğiz ismimiz Seiji. 2 hafta sonraki sınavlara hızlıca çalışmamız gerekirken 2 tane çıtırı kapıp sahile götürüyoruz neymiş depresyondaymışız. Kızları harıl hurul dikizleyip bolca meme göreceğimiz bu yapımı ben çok sevdim. Önceki oyunlardaki absürt bir olaydan sonra gelen fotoğrafları kaldırmışlar daha mantıklı bir hikaye yazabilmişler. Sakura Spirit'te kız göğüslerine çikolata döküp "Parçala beni hulkiiiiiiii" diyordu la.

Özellikle birkaç cümlede "Oyunda anlam var lan" diyeceğiniz bu yapım cinsellikten uzaktır. Sakura Spirit, Sakura Angels'teki gibi fotoğraf bekleyenler bu oyundan acilen vazgeçmeli. Ha fotoğrafın olmadığı zamanlarda meme görüyorsunuz ama küçük foto ondan da zevk alırım diyen buyursun şöyle. Demiştik ya 7 oyun çıkarmışlar diye ve teknikler değiştirmişler ona gelelim.

Bu oyunda yapacağınız 3 farklı seçim oyunun sonunu belirliyor. Oyunun 2 farklı sonu olduğunu da söyleyelim. Manganın renkli hali diye tabir edebileceğim bu oyun oyun sonları farklılığına da girişince iyice farklılaştığı için iyice güzel olmaya başladı. Fakat azalan cinsellik Gabe Newell'dan mıdır yoksa adamların çizeceği rotadan mıdır bilmiyoruz.

Uzun lafın kısası ingilizcenizi geliştirmekte size yardım olacak, bazen tek elle skip skip yapacağınız bu yapım bizim için güzel bir oyundur.

author: {'steamid': '76561198253775158', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 5, 'playtime_forever': 137, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 137, 'last_played': 1444432386}
review:
I know I am not the target audience for this sort of game being female but I wanted to give it a shot anyway. 

+Pros+
+ Most of the music is nice, barring one track I'll explain below.
+I enjoyed the background images of the game. The hotel room images were the nicest.

-Cons-
-Typos abound.
- Strange time issues. For example, one girl says they have a few days left on their vacation yet in the next scene they announce tomorrow is their last day. This happens a few times.
- I didn't like either of the love interests. One is keen on emotional manipulation and the other is big on physical abuse. 
- The song that plays whenever a "hot" photo plays is so flippin' annoying. If you played that to prisoners for twenty-four straight hours, they'd break down and tell you everything you need to know and then end up in psych.
- The story didn't really pull me in. I didn't really care about the outcome or who I ended up with. This game actually felt a LOT longer than the two and a half hours I clicked through it because it was so boring.

~The WTF~
~Obviously people play these games for the females and the images but I couldn't help but get a kick out of how silly the images were. C'mon girls, buy a better fitting bikini top so it doesn't magically fall off! And I have yet to experience the wonderment of my panties randomly sliding down my legs on their own.

I think if you like VNs you'd think this was okay but for me it was incredibly dull and dry.

author: {'steamid': '76561198121278361', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 5, 'playtime_forever': 343, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 343, 'last_played': 1439905266}
review:
Sakura Beach is a comedy visual novel which have their magical (or supernatural) content being removed. I found the protagonist a bit slow on realizing the resentments that his 2 female companies have on him. In my opinion, the story of this VN is not as moving as the previous sakura VNs, but it gives a more realistic feeling to the readers on the fact that this kind of story can happen to anyone as well as its well-designated graphics.

  Positive points
storyline, for it being realistic
characters
graphics
soundtracks
  Negative points
storyline, for it being a little boring
protagonist to be reacting sometimes stupidly

It is not a fantastic visual novel, but I think it's still woth a try, might be useful to look it as an experience^^.

review:

Еще одна часть из серии Sakura. Притом, как оказалось, довольно-таки не плохая)
Плюсы:

Вроде все) К рисовке придрался мб, так-то она вполне приятная)

author: {'steamid': '76561198065455947', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 54, 'playtime_forever': 320, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 320, 'last_played': 1442222946}
review:
This is Italian review. Sorry, I don't think I have the ability to write a english review.

-

La storia ha un banale stile di conversazione comune tra amici in spiaggia, niente di troppo speciale, tutto sommato però in fondo a questa Visual Novel troviamo una quasi piacevole esperienza di gioco rispetto alle Visual Novel delle serie, siccome a durata è aumentato dalle solite due orette massimo che la serie sino ad oggi ci ha abituato.
Ovviamente i fan dell'ecchi non rimarranno delusi, dato che anche qui troviamo molti sfondi a base di questo genere, mischiato sempre con la solita parte Yuri che la serie continua a offrire ai fan.
Come sempre però, il comparto audio e visivo riesce a togliere quel minimo di clichè e banalità che questo lato ecchi e yuri ci offre, riusciendo a creare l'atmosfera per ogni situazione, che rappresenta l'ambiente di gioco o la gravità di una situazione quando essa necessità queste cose.


In poche parole la trama è abbastanza terribile, ma le tette sono ancora grandi.

Link alla recensione completa: http://www.gamersparadise.it/sakura-beach-recensione/

author: {'steamid': '76561198089477451', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 14, 'playtime_forever': 1230, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 39, 'last_played': 1637481046}
review:
Since I don't really see decent reviews here, I'll leave my own opinion. 

I haven't gotten very far into the game, but I will admit it's decent.....for a spell. However, the lack of supporting characters,  voice acting, and additional chapters makes the appeal very short-lived. It's little more than fap material - which is sad because of the potential plot that can develop around a love triangle like this! That, and I have my own games that let me wonder about the universe - thinking critically should NOT be so complex in a friggin' VN with beaches, babes and boobs. 

Unless it goes on sale - or more chapters are released for this story - I wouldn't really recommend it. There are better VN games out there.

review: Why break what doesn't need to be fixed, Beach's character designs feel incredibly foreign to the series, not just compared to the other games, but to its own as well. In the first couple of minutes you can see the backround we're all familier with and then suddenly these two show up looking like their from an entirely different game. And why is this what we're geting when we were promised Chapter 2 of Fantasy, and instead get clicker (a cash grab and a slap to the face to fans who were waiting for 2). Hopefully, this game is a way to buy time until Chapter 2 comes out. Harsh and Demanding, yes I believe I am, but I feel like I'm only demanding what we were originally suppose to get.

author: {'steamid': '76561198130932508', 'num_games_owned': 1226, 'num_reviews': 724, 'playtime_forever': 149, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 149, 'last_played': 1474143792}
review:
[h1]Солнце, море, пляж[/h1]

Итак, это у нас уже 4-ая часть Сакуры (ну или 5-ая, если считать Clicker). Что же теперь? А теперь действие происходит на море. 

Здесь всё в духе Sakura - няшные персонажи в бикини, которых здесь всего 2 =(. 

В сюжет я особо не вникал, да и мое знание английского оставляет желать лучшего...
Цена... Мне кажется она завышена.
Графика... Картинка здесь красивая. И няши выглядят на ура, да и пейзажи тоже.

[h1]Итог:[/h1]
[i]
Брать для коллекции, или любителям аниме, а если уж выбирать между Сакурами, то я бы рекомендовал Angels. Но и эта часть неплохая, но я к тому, что есть и лучше.

С пожеланием полюбоваться картинкой и не стереть руку в хлам, Aikiro, [url=http://steamcommunity.com/groups/steamorators/discussions/0/530649887211640948/]Ораторы Ste@m[/url].[/i]

author: {'steamid': '76561198055323794', 'num_games_owned': 667, 'num_reviews': 9, 'playtime_forever': 101, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 101, 'last_played': 1440347446}
review:
Let's get this out of the way first: I have NOT read everything in the 2 (2 1/2) arcs yet, but then again, I doubt that the other 1 1/2 arcs are gonna be THAT much different from the one I've read, sooo... yeah.
Like every other 'Sakura' VN, the main selling point of 'Sakura Beach' is the fan service, followed by the romance plot.
UNLIKE the other 'Sakura' VNs however (not that far in 'Fantasy', so I'm not sure how it is there) the romance plot is somewhat meh. Mr. MC is about as dense as it gets (heck, many Harem Anime MCs are quicker to pick up on things O.o) and is completely unable to understand anything romance-related... I would say he has his head in the clouds, but that was already stated by one of the girls, welp.
The two main girls are... generic at best: you have the (annoying) Tsundere girl, who insults the MC every time she can, apologizes for that and follows it up with another insult; she also can't swim (even though she's appearently good at sports) and is good at cooking. Even though she shares most of the 'generic Tsundere appearence' she doesn't have Twintails (why that hairstyle is used mainly for Tsunderes is beyond me) and has a... well... rather well evolved chest.
The other Girl is the nice/somewhat sadistic girl who's an absolute trainwreck when it comes to cooking (cinnamon Ramen... i wonder how that tastes), is slightly airheaded and rather perverted (in a 'Sakura' Vn... how unusual). The 
one thing I DIDN'T expect was the fact that she's supposedly also really good at sports.
The main character is... well... lets just say that (except for his love for space) his character traits rarely leave the 'who woulda guessed...' zone.
Now now, I know that using generic characters is not neccessarily a very bad thing, HOWEVER, when you combine generic characters with every single generic ecchi action known to mankind... the VN feels somewhat lackluster. You have the generic 'walk into room with girl dressing' scene (x2), the generic sunoil scene, the generic Popsicle-eating scene (which actually made me laugh)... you get the idea.
Now, what about the choices, you ask?? Surely there has to be decent choices. Well... ok, there IS a fair amount of choices, I'll give them that; also there are 2 1/2 arcs I think. The 'tsundere girl' arc, the 'Momoko' arc and a 'Harem'-Sub-arc for both of them. However, I have only read one of the arcs and yet I'm only missing one CG, so I feel like they are not too different... but don't quote me on that line. 2 1/1 arcs is a fair amount, it gives you a decent amount of choices... so what could possibly be my problem with the routes??
Well, before I go into detail with what pissed me off (sorry about the wording) about the ending, let me quickly say one thing: the Soundtracks are really good in my opinion, however there's only one soundtrack for the Ecchi scenes, which, combined with the abundance of those scenes gets annoying rather quickly.
So, about the ending(s)... the way I chose was:  [spoiler] Momoko ending, no Harem. HOWEVER, the developers decided that THAT was the one time that they did not want to do what everyone else did before them and after them. SO, after getting the Momoko ending (which was really well done, good job), they jumped to the next day, where 'Tsundere girl' (I didn't bother remembering her name... I generally hate Tsundere Characters ._-) said that 'Even though I know you two love each other, I will not give up! I will continue to try to seduce you so one day, you'll love me instead. I talked with Momoko about that and we came to the conclusion that that would be alright'... way to ruin an otherwise awesomely done ending. [/spoiler]

So, would I recommend buying it?? hell, just look at what I voted. Unless the other arc(s) are surprisingly long (unlikely), this VN is WAY too short (101 mins and I was done with the Momoko arc...) for it's money, especially since the Steam version of Nekopara does similar things but better for the same cost; the characters are about as unique as the Borderlands 2 Starter Pistol and there were only two times when the VN left it's comfortable spot on the " 'how expectable' chair"... so if you think about buying this game, I think you should rather spend it on 'Sakura Angels' which has VERY similar main girls but has better endings and a story that is somewhat more enjoyable.

author: {'steamid': '76561198047396412', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 13, 'playtime_forever': 435, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 417, 'last_played': 1446144397}
review:
I'm here for give you real review. My english is not the best, but let's give it a try

Story: It's about guy who spend week in Beach hotel with his 2 childhood friends. There is some romance even in end. It was not so mind blowing like in If My Heart Had Wings (Another Visual novel you HAVE TO GET!) but it's not bad. It good, and I even cry in end. Why? It was so touching! I don't want to tell because spoiler, but it's GOOD 8/10

Art: I was a little worried about this, because it was not same style what Sakura Spirit, Sakura Angels and Sakura Fantasy was, but it turn out to be good. It's not same, but it will do. Actually, this was cuter than original. 8/10 AND YES, There is fanservice for those lewd bastads who see just boobies and dat ass, but I can ignore those... If I want. It won't distract me from story or girls personalities

Gameplay: Same as always. Press Left Mouse to go forward and "next page." In Sakura Beach, there is even more than one ending. You can choose which girl you like so that's a bonus. It gives you chance to get more that just one story, so more reading, pictures and story. 9/10

Soundtracks: This was kind a disappointment. It was just too average. Basic good mood music for normal scenes, sad music for sad scenes, lewd saxophone for dirty scenes and so on. There was only one music track that just "hit me." When you talk serious about love with one of the girls, it made me in tears. That's why i give soundtracks 7/10 and not 6/10

Overall:
FOR THOSE WHO READ VISUAL NOVELS: This one was good. Not over the top like If My Heart Had Wings, But was not bad, no way. I bought this 7,49€ and it was worth it. Even would give it full price. There is cute girls, good story and... yes, fanservice, but it is decent and does not go "all the way." That's why I salute Winged Cloud. 9/10

FOR THOSE WHO DOES NOT READ VISUAL NOVELS: This is basic Visual novel. It's like a book, but in digital formation. You have text and you read it and then press mouse botton, new text appears. Like turning a page. I say, if you happen to found this in -50% or -75%, give it a try. If you buy this in full price, you might disappoint yourself. But for lower price than 5€? Give it a try, you might start reading Visual Novels, VN. That happened to me when I bought Sakura Spirit for 5€.

author: {'steamid': '76561198000459592', 'num_games_owned': 613, 'num_reviews': 10, 'playtime_forever': 151, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 132, 'last_played': 1447072428}
review:
For those who are fans of the Sakura series, expect more the same beautiful art and relaxing music. Sakura Beach takes a detour from the standard fantasy/imaginative settings that the other Sakura games are known for and puts the player in a natural down to earth setting of a male MC and his 2 child hood friends spending a week vacationing at a beach. The story is general flair of conversations of beach activities , nothing too special,  but a nice underlying background story leading up to a enjoyable conclusion mixed in with music and art makes it worth the read. While few flaws appear such as a couple of typo's, mispellings, really dence MC, and prob the fewest choices of the sakura series yet,  they can be overlooked for an enjoyable short story with rather adorable confessions. For those looking for the fan service, some rather enjoyable scenes implied of beach wear along with some yuri action as well. 

Overall an enjoyable experience to go through and I can't wait for the next addition to the Sakura franchise!

author: {'steamid': '76561198050158036', 'num_games_owned': 1162, 'num_reviews': 20, 'playtime_forever': 116, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 116, 'last_played': 1439942740}
review:
Steam really needs to add a neautral recomendation for games. However as it does not, and this novel really does have some issues, I'm going to have to give it a thumbs down.

Sakura beach is the newest (and weakest) installment in the sakura franchise by Winged Cloud. The story takes place with Rene from Infinite Stratos(Ayumi), Kati from Akiba's Trip(Momoko), and the Space Core from Portal 2 (Seiji) all taking a week long vacation to the beach. The story moves along at a steady enough pace, however the scenes are often interrupted by the protagonists unresolved problems. This marked itself as a problem as the plot often went back and forth between a feel-good-beach-romp and then trying to maintain the traditional Sakura formula of having a dangerous situation that requires attention. Except this time the situation is just that Seiji has some abandonment issues rather than being trapped in a spirit world or similar situation.

Between the game being unsure of what type of story it wants to be, short music loops, and only taking half as long to complete as the other Sakura games, I can't reccomend it despite some nice CGs.

author: {'steamid': '76561198036316241', 'num_games_owned': 660, 'num_reviews': 292, 'playtime_forever': 302, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 46, 'last_played': 1457268004}
review:
공장에서 뽑혀나오는 벌크마냥 마구 뽑아대는 사쿠라 시리즈의 최신작 사쿠라 비치입니다. 

그동안 써먹던 작화가에 이어 한명을 더 고용해서 시리즈를 2교대로 돌리려는 제작진의 야욕이 돋보이는 작품이며 대충 찍혀나오는 내용마냥 시리즈의 제목도 사쿠라 뒤에 대충 명사를 붙여서 나오는 듯 한데 머지않아 사쿠라 라이징 및 사쿠라 오리진, 사쿠라 어드밴스드 워페어가 나올듯 합니다.

어쨌든 가슴 큰 여자가 나오는 동시에 그와 정 반대로 스토리나 전개는 매우 빈약한 평범한 사쿠라 시리즈 중 하나라고 볼 수 있겠으며 제목이 비치라길래 항상 그렇듯이 분홍색 머리 여자 캐릭터가 나올 줄 알았는데 나오지 않아서 실망을 할 뻔 했지만 알고보니 제목의 비치는 해변을 뜻하는 단어 비치였더군요.

author: {'steamid': '76561198005521016', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 11, 'playtime_forever': 137, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 137, 'last_played': 1439829097}
review:
Let's have an honest review here, for those who are really thinking 'Do I want to eat lunch, or do I want to buy this game?'

Honestly, if you have two hours to kill, and you'd like a cute enough romance story, go for it. 

What you will find in Sakura Beach:

A protagonist that's extremely blur, but also at the same time very smart and introspective.
A functional storyline, at best.
Some strangely insightful bits of contemplation.
Two cute girls with (albeit very generic) likeable personalities.
The art is good... enough.
it's a sakura game, so yeah there's bewbies.

What you won't find in Sakura Beach:

A coherent tone or pace.
Varied characters.
A rhyme or reason for the yuri cg in the game, like seriously.
A good soundtrack, everytime there's an ecchi sequence this obnoxious saxophone or tuba or french horn track plays in the background, and it's really cheesy. Probably laugh a lot about that.
Amazing art.

On a serious note, I liked it. I mean, i'll be honest and was in it for the bewbies, but there aren't much of those so you'll simply be disappointed. Through the game I came to like the characters, however generic they are. It's a cute, fun enough VN for two hours, and it's not going to change your life, but hey it's good enough for the price.

And really, I would have liked it so much more if the tone had been consistent. I know it's anime and anime shifts tone like a racer shifts gears, but there's a scene where the protagonist is trying to be serious, and the two heroines start making out. Not only did it break the tone swimmingly, it was also uncalled for and had no reason. The girls didn't really talk about it very much and they were talking as if they weren't making out.

The ecchi in this game is random and really misplaced, and is really simply fanservice. There are points in time they don't even bother setting up the ecchi scene and it simply appears from out of thin air. 

When the game isn't being completely inconsistent, it has nice enough dialogue that'll make you go 'aww', and the romance can be quite sweet. It's nothing too deep and you can see it from a mile away (although the protagonist doesn't seem to), but yeah. It's like, sufficient I guess.

All in all, I liked Sakura Beach. Really. It was fun, and I would just like to think that the random yuri scenes and outbreaks of ecchi that the game throws at you are simply a metaphor for Seiji's (The protagonist) repressed sexuality, because he's close to these two really hot girls and thinks it's impure to think of them that way, this manifests in his daydreaming getting out of hand and bam! They start making out. Which is probably why they don't really think about it that much. But then again, it's anime, not literature, so I'm probably thinking too much about it. 

I hope that was the intention, though, then I wouldn't have to be dissappointed in the game so much.

author: {'steamid': '76561198097276870', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 1, 'playtime_forever': 60, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 60, 'last_played': 1439800392}
review:
I'm honestly not so sure what to think about this game. The beginning seemed rather fine, except for the fact that the UI for the main menu was actually rather scrubbed clean. Which in turn would tell me that the game didn't have too much effort put into it. That's basically what the experience is. The entire plot feels taped together body parts of many japanese comedy-romance tropes that it seems too predictable. It's extremely linear, or bi-linear, as you have to pick and choose sides between the two women, or two unaged girls I honestly can't tell the difference.

But as stated before by other people you don't get many choices at begin with. You could feel that who ever was forced to make this didn't give a toss when you see two large options on your screen for the first time. You would've probably had a sense of relief that it would have remembered that it's supposed to have choices. But after a while it doesn't happen again, and when it does it's the same dual action that favors one girl over the other. I mean I would've wanted more choices so I could intervene a little bit more. Just so I could make this completely annoying protagonist move away from being this awkward 'science nerd' into someone that I would possibly relate too. Yet that just never happened as things continue on and I spam the spacebar through useless word filler.

But when you do start to read it you do find that it's as cliche as the rotting piles of scum you find on your television that try to take the word cliche and wear it as a hat. Honestly I found myself playing Crossy Road and Fallout Shelter on my smartphone fifteen minutes into the bloody thing. Looking at my computer every now and then like a bored digusted father during a mid life crisis as he looks into a mirror. Yet I don't think I really have to say much of anything else about it. This really does feel like watching the pliot/final episode to a dull tv show. It won't allow me to put much effort into grilling it since there wasn't any effort put into it. So lets at least count up all of the bad things about this anime interactive novel. 

One-Terrile dialogue that would make a public school play writer jealous.
Two-An annoyingly thick protagonist that has the cliche short story arch of him needing to learn how to love and cut loose.
Three-Giving you less options to choose from than a starbucks knockoff.
Four-Honestly how could anyone be shocked about two girls kissing nowadays? I'm sorry Mr. Protagonist you'll have to start getting with the times since you really sounded like a republician stuck in the streets of San Francisco when you saw your two childhood friend giving each other a snog.

It'll probably get a pass by people aren't as desensitized to soft core anime sims. As for a few other people that I've seen down in the reviews that also are pointing out the same flaws, or at least some of them. In all this sim feels empty and leaves you as such. Like eating twenty snack sized bag of crisps that are more air than actual crisps... And is ironically priced the same.




I wonder if I should at least put some effort into thinking up a few good things about. I should just put the same effort as who ever made i-

author: {'steamid': '76561197960345251', 'num_games_owned': 959, 'num_reviews': 12, 'playtime_forever': 1719, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 28, 'last_played': 1460474599}
review:
This is the latest game in the Sakura series games, it doesn't have anything to do with the earlier ones and in fact this game is more down to earth than the former ones. No monsters or demons. It's about a high school guy who goes on a vacation trip to the beach with his two best childhood friends, they happen to be women, since it's a rather short story I will not go into much more details as I don't want to spoil anything, but it is rather different from earlier Sakura stories and I wouldn't say the story is that unique or special but in my humble opinion there are a lot worse stories out there and this game even have multiple endings.

People who have played the other Sakura games will notice a slight difference in the artwork, this is because it's not the usual artist but a guest artist, I'm fine with this although I guess there are hardcore fans who aren't, I find the art just fine, not sure what people find wrong about it since it's not that big of a difference. The game also shows less skin than the earlier Sakura games but there are still some suggestive artwork. Again I guess there are people out there who thinks Sakura creators have gone soft but I doubt that, it will be back to "normal" in the upcoming games.

Since this is a bit of a step back to the earlier Sakura games and the story is shorter and the choices are slightly less compared to Sakura Fantasy I find the price tag just fine, especially with the 25% off that is has until August 21st.

TL;DR 

Shorter story than last game, no monsters, different artist, less skin, good price. I still recommend it.

author: {'steamid': '76561198014791394', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 18, 'playtime_forever': 73, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 73, 'last_played': 1439996842}
review:
While visually quite beautiful, this "game" sadly doesn't have anything going on for it at all. The very few choices you make barely have any impact on the story itself, apart from a few lines at the very end regarding which one of your two childhood friends that end up as your girlfriend.

There's a ton of visual novels out there with a quite acceptable storyline, and with choices that make the story take interesting turns, or at least adds a few more pictures to your gallery that you can enjoy watching again. Sakura Beach does not have any of those qualifications, apart from having a few pictures of cute anime girls in their swimsuits or underwear. Not worth spending your money on. :)

author: {'steamid': '76561197996838808', 'num_games_owned': 114, 'num_reviews': 12, 'playtime_forever': 79, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 78, 'last_played': 1456807351}
review:
Trash.

The main character (you), Seiji has too much personality. He's a fucking moron, and it's completely out of my control what he does. I thought I was buying a game here, where I get to choose what happens. Nope, this is not a game. It's a fucking power point presentation where I get to click click click and watch in horror as deuchebag Seiji spaces out in the presence of two hot girls, completely oblivious to their ever present advances.

Almost two hours in and I think I've had the opportunity to respond to the girl's questions three times, all of which seemed inconsequential to the story. I want to respond to what they say in my own way, but I'm not given the opportunity when I want to do so. If I knew in advance that this was a slide show, I would have watched an anime instead. I've played a better game/romance sim that cost nothing (Seduce Me the Otome)

Do I finish the game? I don't even want to play anymore. I'm pissed off at Seiji being more of a person than Ayumi and Momoko are. Seiji is passionate about space, wants to be an astrophysicist, has been struggling in school to get his grades up, has fond memories of his grandfather teaching him about space, is OCD about girls hoarding his snacks, loves vanilla ice cream, doesn't care for girls... WTF, I'm supposed to learn about the love interests, not Seiji! Seiji should be invisible, an empty shell, a name only. I can't project myself onto a person, and that's why I can't enjoy this game.

author: {'steamid': '76561198072565632', 'num_games_owned': 119, 'num_reviews': 5, 'playtime_forever': 137, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 108, 'last_played': 1451725365}
review: As a big fan of the Sakura series, I can say that this one has the best art of them all. The problem lies in the fact that it has so little scenes. In Sakura Beach there where only 15 special slides, so i took me no time at all to discover them. In Winged Cloud's popular game Sakura Fantasy part 1, is has 32 special slides, thats more than double the amount of Sakura Beach! While i am impressed with the improved art style, the lack in game content in addition to the weightlessness of the choices make this game insuperior to its predecessors and left me feeling dissapointed.

author: {'steamid': '76561198154545285', 'num_games_owned': 440, 'num_reviews': 62, 'playtime_forever': 1441, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1293, 'last_played': 1457269580}
review:
Sakura Beach a short visual novel that has a slice of life feeling to it developed by Winged Cloud giving players choices to make which will affect the outcome at the end will take around 2-3 hours to complete 1 readthrough.

[h1] The Story [/h1]
The game starts of with the protagonist named Seiji a space fanatic daydreaming about the universe in the lobby of a hotel to be only snapped out of it by 1 of his childhood friend.
While on a vacation for a week to the beach with his two chilhood friends, all he ever thought was to take out his telescope and look at the stars. But during the course of the week the protaganist gradually, begins to realise that his childhood friends want him to pay attention to them instead of constellations...

[u] A note: There is yuri content in it and its really pleasing to the eye to but the yuri scenes feels a little out of place but do not let this stop you from getting this VN. [/u]

[h1] Audio and Visual elements [/h1]
[i] For the visual elements, i will spilt it into 2 sections because there is 2 very distinctive art style mixed in it. The background art and characther art. [/i]

[b] BACKGROUND art [/b] - I find it beautiful as there are hints of pastel colour paintings used in the backgrounds which i find it unique.
[b] CHARACTHER art [/b] - 1 thing you would surely realise is that the design of the characther are differnt from the other sakura games which i find it good as it gives a fresh new look to the characthers.

As for the [b]AUDIO,[/b] it manages to set the mood for every situation, depicting the environment of playfulness or seriousness when it needs to do so. Nothing too fancy here.

[h1]To sum up,[/h1] 
I would recommend this visual novel to people who want something short and fans of the sakura series and fans of the genre Yuri and romance. But don't expect too much because it will take you just 2-3 hours to complete the whole visual novel.

[url=https://azusantiara.wordpress.com/2015/11/05/sakura-beach-review/]Click here for full review![/url]
